meta.description: Minimize pollution from transportation by choosing the most environmentally friendly modes of transportation.

params.name: pollution
params.description: Pollution units produced per trip for each mode

params.name: capacity
params.description: Product units transported per trip for each mode

vars.name: trips
vars.description: Number of trips for each mode

vars.name: mode_selected
vars.description: Binary variable indicating if a mode is selected

objective.name: min_total_pollution
objective.expr: sum(pollution[m] * trips[m] for m in MODES)
objective.description: Minimize total pollution from all trips

constraints.name: select_two_modes
constraints.description: Select exactly two modes of transportation

constraints.name: product_transport_requirement
constraints.expr_lhs: sum(capacity[m] * trips[m] for m in MODES)
constraints.description: Transport at least 300 units of products

constraints.name: total_trip_limit
constraints.description: Total number of trips must be less than or equal to 20

constraints.name: motorcycle_mode_selection
constraints.description: Motorcycle trips are limited by mode selection

constraints.name: small_truck_mode_selection
constraints.description: Small truck trips are limited by mode selection

constraints.name: large_truck_mode_selection
constraints.description: Large truck trips are limited by mode selection
